features: Enjoy Pain-Free Life with Ultimate Comfort – Our back support pillow is adjustable to the contours of your body, making it a great lumbar support pillow while driving or working long hours. The seat cushion for office chair is of utmost relief for coccyx/tailbone pain.

Best Orthopedic Pillow – FORTEM chair cushion has an ergonomic "U" Shaped Cutout. This sitting pad is highly recommended by orthopedic experts as it alleviates pressure on the sciatica nerve to reduce back, leg, and butt pain. Enjoy it as an office chair cushion or as a car pillow.

Premium Quality and Easy Maintenance – The seat cushion and lumbar support pillow for car are made from 100% pure memory foam. It helps maintain a healthy body posture by absorbing some of the pressure against your body. This half donut cushion seat and back cushion are encased in a removable, washable mesh covers.

Versatile and Lightweight – Our lumbar support pillow for chair has adjustable elastic straps, it can also be used as a lumbar support pillow for car seat. Desk chair cushion can also work as a car seat cushion, or wheelchair cushion. Being portable, these memory foam seat cushions are your all-time travel companion.
One-year warranty – Enjoy being driver of your favorite car, truck, or gaming on your computer to heart’s content. Your FORTEM chair pillow and seat cushion for car come with a full year warranty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the right seat cushion for all your back support needs!
reviews.reviewText: I will begin by saying if you spend time sitting down, you should use a seat cushion. Just sitting or lying down for too long increases the risk of chronic health problems, as spine issues and this is my case.I have to say it is very well made and very supportive. It is not too soft and not too hard. This combo of back support and seat support has really make a difference for me. Wherever I am in my home or in my office I use this combo and I am so happy with the results.The only issue I experienced with the order was an error when handling my , but itFORTREM immediately sent me a replacement in no time. Many thanks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars happy with my purchase
reviews.reviewText: been looking for a comfortable seat cushion for a while now especially for my very uncomfortable (I got the cheapest at the store) office chair. i didn't really want to spend too much on an ergonomic chair so i thought pairing a basic chair with a plushy seat and back cushion would suffice. glad i did. testing it out now and i'm satisfied with its support, comfort and quality. It came in a vacuum sealed package and easily went back to its plushy shape after opening. glad i bought it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Would recommend with caution
reviews.reviewText: First the pros. I purchased this for use at work, where I'm averaging 8 to 9 hours of sitting in this chair. I wasn't outright experiencing any pain that prompted the purchase, I just wanted to be more comfortable. I liked the color options that this brand offered, as well as being able to purchase just the seat cushion, back cushion, or both. The cushion is very soft and comfortable, and I like the fabric mesh material. I haven't had to wash them yet, but I feel like it wouldn't be a problem. The buckle that the back came with works fine, and I haven't had issues with adjusting or unhooking them.Cons: I'm not sure the back cushion is doing any real good. With my chair, the back is kind of just there and flat. The back cushion is very large, and it's to the point where it forces me to sit a little further out, so I'm not fully sitting in the chair. I feel like because of this, it's causing some leg pain. Throughout the day sometimes I have to remove the back cushion.Ultimately, I don't regret this purchase. It adds some nice color to my office and the cushions themselves are nice. I definitely love the seat cushion, but the back might be a little unnecessary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awsome cushion support.
reviews.reviewText: I have never really giving a thought about having a cushion for driving. When I recieved this on the mail I was really surprised that it was so soft and thick. After a few days of using it while driving I noticed a huge difference my back was not hurting alot and my butt felt better after those long drives. During the winters low temperatures I did find out that if I left it inside my car the gel would freeze and the seat would become hard, it was so funny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I really don't know
reviews.reviewText: This product has proper support, excellent installation methods that hold it's position rather well and rather good comfort in my opinion. However, this product is definitely not meant for everyone.Simply put, the lumbar support is very apparent but it's also rather intense. I personally wish they had a model of this with maybe half the support. That said, it's also probably due to the design of my chair. I have a standard, flat back office chair so any alterations to it's seating design are very apparent. I imagine this would be great with more cushioned or curved style seat backing.Otherwise, it's comfortable and doesn't make my back feel like it's been resting against solid plastic or wood anymore. I'd say it's at least worth trying out for the quality and design that's gone into this alone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and affordable
reviews.reviewText: My husband has been complaining of back pain for a while now. He drives around a lot for work and I stumbled upon this when searching for Christmas presents. I figured it might be worth trying out and got it for him as a gift. He’s been using it in the car and enjoys it. It’s comfortable to sit on and has helped relieve some tension in his back. It goes back and forth between cars so frequently that we might end up having to buy another one 😂For the price I’d purchase one again. There is also I back cushion that can be purchased as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for cost
reviews.reviewText: It is a little more lean than I was anticipating from the photos. It works well and it comfortable though! It’s been a couple weeks and held up. Delivery was quick

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Well made seat cushion for sciatic back pain
reviews.reviewText: Seat cushion is well made. It is large and very well cushioned and lightweight. I’ve tried others, but this one is the best and allows me to sit for long periods without much pain.
I work at a desk all day, I find this helps with my posture and back/neck pain!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Lumbar Support, Mixed Comfort for Extended Use
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Seat Cushion for Office Chair and have found it to be a game-changer for my work setup. The inclusion of both the seat and lumbar rest initially intrigued me, and it has notably alleviated my persistent back pain during long hours at the computer.The lumbar support is exceptional; it provides the right amount of firmness and contour to support my lower back, making extended periods of sitting far more comfortable. I've noticed a significant reduction in back pain and stiffness since using it, which has been a huge relief.However, while the lumbar support is fantastic, I found the seat cushion slightly lacking in comfort for extended use. Initially, it feels comfortable, but after prolonged sitting, I noticed it became less supportive, causing some discomfort.Overall, this product has been a worthwhile investment for improving my posture and reducing back pain. The lumbar support alone makes a substantial difference in my daily comfort. Nevertheless, while the seat cushion is decent for shorter periods, it might benefit from some improvement for extended sitting sessions.Would I recommend it? Absolutely, especially if you're seeking relief from back pain and better lumbar support. Just keep in mind that the seat cushion might not provide the same level of comfort over extended periods.

Great product, provide good lumbar support. The straps allow you to adjust the pillow to the proper position. I purchased a lumbar support pillow and was quite impressed, so I ordered a second one. The material seems to be quite durable and should last a long time.
O produto não é ruim, mas não atendeu minhas expectativas, não compraria novamente
